title: Refactor sync_node_to_yaml: function is 172 lines, severely exceeds 50 line threshold
Add pyright suppressions cleanup: many reportUnknownMemberType suppressions may mask real issues
Create test_cli.py with comprehensive Click command testing
Refactor synthesize_missing_documentation_with_openai: function is 117 lines, exceeds 50 line threshold
File handle leak in writer.py - missing context manager for file writes
Reduce code duplication in CLI decorators: dbt_opts, yaml_opts, logging_opts have similar patterns
Add error condition and edge case tests
Create test_logger.py for logging infrastructure
Add test coverage for path_management edge cases
Missing error handling in _write_yaml - write failure leaves cache in inconsistent state
Add comprehensive __all__ declarations to all core modules
description: Many core modules lack explicit __all__ declarations, making it unclear what the public API is. inheritance.py, node_filters.py, and path_management.py all have incomplete or missing __all__ exports.

title: Add module-level type hints to avoid extensive t.Any casts throughout core modules
Potential data loss in restructure - file deletion without validation of write success
Create test_inheritance.py with complex graph scenarios
Document and formalize TransformPipeline commit modes
description: TransformPipeline has four commit modes (none, batch, atomic, defer) but their semantics and error handling behavior are not documented. The atomic mode calls sync_node_to_yaml inline which is different from deferred batch commits.

title: Memory leak in _YAML_BUFFER_CACHE - unbounded cache growth without eviction
Extract constant for default connection TTL (3600.0 seconds) in DbtProjectContext
Fix inconsistent error handling in _add_cross_project_references: bare except with pass
Potential unbounded thread pool in YamlRefactorContext - no max_workers limit set
CRITICAL: Race condition in _YAML_BUFFER_CACHE - unthreadsafe dictionary access
Create test_llm.py with mocked LLM provider testing
Create test_settings.py for YamlRefactorSettings and YamlRefactorContext
Add docstring to internal str_representer function in schema/parser.py
Resource leak in commit_yamls - BytesIO staging objects not properly closed
Add outcome assertions to happy-path transform tests
Reduce tight coupling to dbt-core internal APIs
description: config.py directly imports from dbt.parser.manifest, dbt.task.sql, and other internal dbt modules. This creates tight coupling to dbt-core's internal structure which may break with dbt updates. Consider using a facade or adapter pattern.

title: Silent failure in _get_unrendered - column metadata lookup returns None without validation
Explore Streamlit workbench testing approach
Missing error handling in YAML load - malformed YAML causes unhandled exception
Add multi-database integration tests (Postgres)
Missing exception handling in TransformOperation.__call__ - metadata success set before exception
Extract constant for YAML string truncation limit (80 chars) in pretty_print_plan
Unsafe list modification during iteration in sync_operations - removing while iterating
Introduce Protocol-based interfaces for YamlRefactorContext
description: Context objects are passed as 't.Any' throughout transforms and pipelines, losing type safety. Define protocols (YamlRefactorContextProtocol, DbtProjectContextProtocol) to enable proper type checking while maintaining duck typing flexibility.

title: Add dbt 1.10.0 to CI test matrix
Refactor get_columns: function is 90 lines, exceeds 50 line threshold
Create test_schema_modules.py for reader/writer/parser
Improve cache invalidation strategy for _COLUMN_LIST_CACHE and _YAML_BUFFER_CACHE
description: Global module-level caches have no TTL or size limits. _COLUMN_LIST_CACHE can grow unbounded and _YAML_BUFFER_CACHE is never explicitly cleared except on file writes. Add cache eviction policies.

title: Extract YAML schema orchestration layer into dedicated module
description: sync_operations.py and restructuring.py both handle YAML orchestration logic. These responsibilities should be separated: restructuring should plan moves, while a new orchestrator should coordinate the execution plan with proper abstraction.

title: Add property-based tests for transform pipeline
CRITICAL: Race condition in _COLUMN_LIST_CACHE - unthreadsafe cache access
Consolidate duplicate type annotations and remove pyright suppressions
description: The codebase has 38 pyright suppressions across 13 files. Many are due to 't.Any' being used for context instead of proper protocols. This reduces type safety and makes the code harder to understand.

title: Memory leak in _COLUMN_LIST_CACHE - unbounded cache growth without eviction
Separate node filtering concerns into dedicated strategy pattern
description: node_filters.py mixes filtering logic with iteration logic. The _iter_candidate_nodes function combines filtering, iteration, and topological sorting. These should be separate composable strategies.

title: Refactor _build_column_knowledge_graph: function is 110 lines, exceeds 50 line threshold
Document why DbtProjectContext uses lazy adapter initialization with connection TTL
Missing null check in sync_operations - column metadata may be None causing AttributeError
TOCTOU race condition in path_management - node.fqn mutation during format string evaluation
Extract hardcoded string literals like dbt-osmosis and dbt_osmosis into module constants
Consider splitting workbench app.py: main() function is doing too much (initialization + rendering)
Race condition in DbtProjectContext.adapter - _adapter check outside lock
Exception swallowed in get_columns - database introspection failure caught and logged only
Eliminate star imports in core/__init__.py for better API surface
description: The core/__init__.py uses star imports from all submodules, exposing internal APIs. Combined with osmosis.py re-exporting, this creates a confusing public API surface with poor discoverability. Use explicit __all__ exports.

title: Missing validation in _build_column_knowledge_graph - ancestor.columns may not exist
Define YamlRefactorContext Protocol to reduce t.Any usage in function signatures
Potential infinite recursion in _build_node_ancestor_tree for circular dependencies
Set up mutation testing with mutmut or similar
Add docstring for parse_args function in workbench app.py
Potential KeyError in _get_setting_for_node - accessing dict keys without .get() fallback
Add pytest-cov and coverage reporting infrastructure
Refactor inheritance.py to reduce cyclomatic complexity
description: The _build_column_knowledge_graph function is 110 lines with deeply nested loops and multiple conditional branches. Extract helper functions for: variant resolution, unrendered value extraction, and metadata merging.

title: Extract duplicate context access patterns into helper methods to reduce repetition
